projects.title: RogueOut
projects.description: A work-in-progress Roguelite version of the classic game of Breakout, created in Unity with C#. This personal project has been worked on for roughly 1 month, whenever I had free time to work on this.

projects.title: Tower of Gun
projects.description: A work-in-progress 2D shoot'em up game, created in Unity with C#. I started developing this game in January 2023, but have stopped progress since around late March.

projects.title: Treasure of The Ancients
projects.description: A small Simulator-type game made in Unity and coded in C#. It is an academic project for my course in Interactive Media Development. All art assets are from OpenGameArt.com.

projects.title: Dog Website
projects.description: A website made using HTML and CSS to feature a precious friend. It is an academic project from the course Intro to Game Web Dev.

projects.title: Word Guesser
projects.description: A small word game made utilizing Javascript, PixiJS, and APIS. It is an academic project from the course Intro to Game Web Dev.
